library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(visdat)
library(likert)
library(skimr)
library(readr)
df <- read_csv("data/results-survey731951.csv")


answer_levels <- c("Strongly disagree", "disagree", "Neither agree or disagree",
                   "Agree", "Strongly agree", "This topic is not relevant to my research", "Don’t know or don’t have enough information")
a1_df %>% 


a1_df <- df %>%
    pull(`A1[SQ002]`) %>% unique() %>%
  select(starts_with("A1[")) %>% 
  mutate(across(.fns = factor, levels = answer_levels))
